content.prompt: The battle described in the passage was significant in that it was part of which of the following developments of the First World War?

choices.label: The globalization of what began as a European conflict
The stalemate that resulted from trench warfare on the Western Front
The emergence of racial ideology as a motivation for conflict
The breakup of large multiethnic European empires

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
